ai-atk-s0403a37:1_1: Pure others likewise, the other two enemy:
ai-atk-s0403a37:1_2: and established on the Realised One’s virtue, being established in his mind the Enlightened One’s special qualities,
ai-atk-s0403a37:1_4: Virtuous conduct is the noble, endowed with virtue,
ai-atk-s0403a37:1_5: and reviewing knowledge of the enquire of knowledge,
